entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
